overview: Got a big debt? No need to worry. There are many online gambling sites that promise to give you a huge profit for a short amount of time. Sania, a single mother whoâ€™s got online gambling as a hobby, wants to pay her rent before she and her daughter got kicked out by their old, flirty landlord. However, her daughter does not know that Sania had came back to the world of online gambling.
tagline: In the world of gambling, one can get rich quick but can also get poor fast.
title: It's Fun to Gamble, If You Win
